001package imagingbook.pub.geometry.fitting;
002
003import static imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
004
005import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.ArrayRealVector;
006import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.LUDecomposition;
007import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
008import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
009import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector;
010import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.SingularValueDecomposition;
011
012import imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix;
013import imagingbook.lib.settings.PrintPrecision;
014import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
015import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntDouble;
016import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntInt;
017
018
019/**
020 * Implements a 2-dimensional Procrustes fit, using the algorithm described in 
021 * Shinji Umeyama, "Least-squares estimation of transformation parameters 
022 * between two point patterns", IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and 
023 * Machine Intelligence 13.4 (Apr. 1991), pp. 376â€“380.
024 * Usage example (also see the {@code main()} method of this class):
025 * <pre>
026 * Point[] P = ... // create sequence of 2D source points
027 * Point[] Q = ... // create sequence of 2D target points
028 * ProcrustesFit pf = new ProcrustesFit(P, Q);
029 * double err = pf.getError();
030 * RealMatrix R = pf.getR();
031 * RealVector t = pf.getT();
032 * double s = pf.getScale();
033 * double err = pf.getError();
034 * RealMatrix A = pf.getTransformationMatrix();
035 * </pre>
036 * 
037 * @author W. Burger
038 * @version 2021/11/27
039 */
040public class ProcrustesFit implements LinearFit2D {
041        
042        private final RealMatrix R;                                     // orthogonal (rotation) matrix
043        private final RealVector t;                                     // translation vector
044        private final double s;                                         // uniform scale
045        
046        private final RealMatrix A;                                     // resulting transformation matrix
047        private final double err;                                       // RMS fitting error
048        
049        // --------------------------------------------------------------
050        
051        /**
052         * Convenience constructor, with
053         * parameters {@code allowTranslation}, {@code allowScaling} and {@code forceRotation}
054         * set to {@code true}.
055         * @param P the source points
056         * @param Q the target points
057         */
058        public ProcrustesFit(Pnt2d[] P, Pnt2d[] Q) {
059                this(P, Q, true, true, true);
060        }
061        
062        /**
063         * Full constructor.
064         * @param P the first point sequence
065         * @param Q the second point sequence
066         * @param allowTranslation if {@code true}, translation (t) between point sets is considered, 
067         *              otherwise zero translation is assumed
068         * @param allowScaling if {@code true}, scaling (s) between point sets is considered, 
069         *              otherwise unit scale assumed
070         * @param forceRotation if {@code true}, the orthogonal part of the transformation (Q)
071         *              is forced to a true rotation and no reflection is allowed
072         */
073        public ProcrustesFit(Pnt2d[] P, Pnt2d[] Q, boolean allowTranslation, boolean allowScaling, boolean forceRotation) {
074                checkSize(P, Q);
075                
076                double[] meanP = null;
077                double[] meanY = null;
078                
079                if (allowTranslation) {
080                        meanP = getMeanVec(P);
081                        meanY = getMeanVec(Q);
082                }
083                
084                RealMatrix vP = makeDataMatrix(P, meanP);
085                RealMatrix vQ = makeDataMatrix(Q, meanY);
086                MatrixUtils.checkAdditionCompatible(vP, vQ);    // P, Q of same dimensions?
087                
088                RealMatrix QPt = vQ.multiply(vP.transpose());
089                SingularValueDecomposition svd = new SingularValueDecomposition(QPt);
090                
091                RealMatrix U = svd.getU();
092                RealMatrix S = svd.getS();
093                RealMatrix V = svd.getV();
094                        
095                double d = (svd.getRank() >= 2) ? det(QPt) : det(U) * det(V);
096                
097                RealMatrix D = MatrixUtils.createRealIdentityMatrix(2);
098                if (d < 0 && forceRotation)
099                        D.setEntry(1, 1, -1);
100                
101                R = U.multiply(D).multiply(V.transpose());
102                
103                double normP = vP.getFrobeniusNorm();
104                double normQ = vQ.getFrobeniusNorm();
105                
106                s = (allowScaling) ? 
107                                S.multiply(D).getTrace() / sqr(normP) : 1.0;
108                
109                if (allowTranslation) {
110                        RealVector ma = MatrixUtils.createRealVector(meanP);
111                        RealVector mb = MatrixUtils.createRealVector(meanY);
112                        t = mb.subtract(R.scalarMultiply(s).operate(ma));
113                }
114                else {
115                        t = new ArrayRealVector(2);     // zero vector
116                }
117                
118                // make the transformation matrix A
119                RealMatrix cR = R.scalarMultiply(s);
120                A = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(2, 3);
121                A.setSubMatrix(cR.getData(), 0, 0);
122                A.setColumnVector(2, t);
123                
124                // calculate the fitting error:
125                err = Math.sqrt(sqr(normQ) - sqr(S.multiply(D).getTrace() / normP));    
126        }
127        
128        // -----------------------------------------------------------------
129        
130        /**
131         * Retrieves the estimated scale.
132         * @return The estimated scale (or 1 if {@code allowscaling = false}).
133         */
134        public double getScale() {
135                return s;
136        }
137        
138        /**
139         * Retrieves the estimated orthogonal (rotation) matrix.
140         * @return The estimated rotation matrix.
141         */
142        public double[][] getR() {
143                return R.getData();
144        }
145        
146        /**
147         * Retrieves the estimated translation vector.
148         * @return The estimated translation vector.
149         */
150        public double[] getT() {
151                return t.toArray();
152        }
153        
154        // --------------------------------------------------------
155        
156        @Override
157        public double[][] getTransformationMatrix() {
158                return A.getData();
159//              return A;
160        }
161        
162        @Override
163        public double getError() {
164                return err;
165        }
166        
167        /**
168         * Calculates the total error for the estimated fit as
169         * the sum of the squared Euclidean distances between the 
170         * transformed point set X and the reference set Y.
171         * This method is provided for testing as an alternative to
172         * the quicker {@link getError} method.
173         * @param P Sequence of n-dimensional points.
174         * @param Q Sequence of n-dimensional points (reference).
175         * @return The total error for the estimated fit.
176         */
177        private double getEuclideanError(Pnt2d[] P, Pnt2d[] Q) {
178                int m = Math.min(P.length,  Q.length);
179                RealMatrix sR = R.scalarMultiply(s);
180                double errSum = 0;
181                for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
182                        RealVector p = new ArrayRealVector(P[i].toDoubleArray());
183                        RealVector q = new ArrayRealVector(Q[i].toDoubleArray());
184                        RealVector pp = sR.operate(p).add(t);
185                        //System.out.format("p=%s, q=%s, pp=%s\n", p.toString(), q.toString(), pp.toString());
186                        double e = pp.subtract(q).getNorm();
187                        errSum = errSum + e * e;
188                }
189                return Math.sqrt(errSum);       // correct!
190        }
191        
192        // -----------------------------------------------------------------
193        
194        private double det(RealMatrix M) {
195                return new LUDecomposition(M).getDeterminant();
196        }
197        
198        private double[] getMeanVec(Pnt2d[] points) {
199                double sumX = 0;
200                double sumY = 0;
201                for (Pnt2d p : points) {
202                        sumX = sumX + p.getX();
203                        sumY = sumY + p.getY();
204                }
205                return new double[] {sumX / points.length, sumY / points.length};
206        }
207        
208        private RealMatrix makeDataMatrix(Pnt2d[] points, double[] meanX) {
209                RealMatrix M = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(2, points.length);
210                RealVector mean = MatrixUtils.createRealVector(meanX);
211                int i = 0;
212                for (Pnt2d p : points) {
213                        RealVector cv = p.toRealVector();
214//                      RealVector cv = MatrixUtils.createRealVector(p.toDoubleArray());
215                        if (meanX != null) {
216                                cv = cv.subtract(mean);
217                        }
218                        M.setColumnVector(i, cv);
219                        i++;
220                }
221                return M;
222        }
223        
224//      private void printSVD(SingularValueDecomposition svd) {
225//              RealMatrix U = svd.getU();
226//              RealMatrix S = svd.getS();
227//              RealMatrix V = svd.getV();
228//              System.out.println("------ SVD ---------------");
229//              System.out.println("U = " + Matrix.toString(U.getData()));
230//              System.out.println("S = " + Matrix.toString(S.getData()));
231//              System.out.println("V = " + Matrix.toString(V.getData()));
232//              System.out.println("--------------------------");
233//      }
234        
235        
236        private void checkSize(Pnt2d[] P, Pnt2d[] Q) {
237                if (P.length < 3 || Q.length < 3) {
238                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("At least 3 point pairs are required to calculate this fit");
239                }
240        }
241
242        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
243        
244        private static double roundToDigits(double x, int ndigits) {
245                int d = (int) Math.pow(10, ndigits);
246                return Math.rint(x * d) / d;
247        }
248
249        public static void main(String[] args) {
250                PrintPrecision.set(6);
251                int NDIGITS = 1;
252                
253                boolean allowTranslation = true;
254                boolean allowScaling = true;
255                boolean forceRotation = true;
256                
257                double a = 0.6;
258                double[][] R0data =
259                        {{ Math.cos(a), -Math.sin(a) },
260                         { Math.sin(a),  Math.cos(a) }};
261                
262                RealMatrix R0 = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(R0data);
263                double[] t0 = {4, -3};
264                double s = 3.5;
265                
266                System.out.format("original alpha: a = %.6f\n", a);
267                System.out.println("original rotation: R = \n" + Matrix.toString(R0.getData()));
268                System.out.println("original translation: t = " + Matrix.toString(t0));
269                System.out.format("original scale: s = %.6f\n", s);
270                System.out.println();
271                
272                Pnt2d[] P = {
273                                PntInt.from(2, 5),
274                                PntInt.from(7, 3),
275                                PntInt.from(0, 9),
276                                PntInt.from(5, 4)
277                };
278                
279                Pnt2d[] Q = new Pnt2d[P.length];
280                
281                for (int i = 0; i < P.length; i++) {
282                        Pnt2d q = PntDouble.from(R0.operate(P[i].toDoubleArray()));
283                        // noise!
284                        double qx = roundToDigits(s * q.getX() + t0[0], NDIGITS);
285                        double qy = roundToDigits(s * q.getY() + t0[1], NDIGITS);
286                        Q[i] = Pnt2d.PntDouble.from(qx, qy);
287                }
288                
289                //P[0] = Point.create(2, 0);    // to provoke a large error
290                
291                ProcrustesFit pf = new ProcrustesFit(P, Q, allowTranslation, allowScaling, forceRotation);
292
293                double[][] R = pf.getR();
294                System.out.format("estimated alpha: a = %.6f\n", Math.acos(R[0][0]));
295                System.out.println("estimated rotation: R = \n" + Matrix.toString(R));
296                double[] T = pf.getT();
297                System.out.println("estimated translation: t = " + Matrix.toString(T));
298                System.out.format("estimated scale: s = %.6f\n", pf.getScale());
299                
300                System.out.println();
301                System.out.format("RMS fitting error = %.6f\n", pf.getError());
302                System.out.format("euclidean error (test) = %.6f\n", pf.getEuclideanError(P, Q));
303                
304                double[][] A = pf.getTransformationMatrix();
305                System.out.println("transformation matrix: A = \n" + Matrix.toString(A));
306        }
307
308        /*
309        original alpha: a = 0.600000
310        original rotation: R = 
311        {{0.825336, -0.564642}, 
312        {0.564642, 0.825336}}
313        original translation: t = {4.000000, -3.000000}
314        original scale: s = 3.500000
315        
316        estimated alpha: a = 0.599589
317        estimated rotation: R = 
318        {{0.825568, -0.564303}, 
319        {0.564303, 0.825568}}
320        estimated translation: t = {3.980905, -3.011055}
321        estimated scale: s = 3.500560
322        
323        fitting error = 0.048079
324        euclidean error (test) = 0.048079
325        transformation matrix: A = 
326        {{2.889950, -1.975377, 3.980905}, 
327        {1.975377, 2.889950, -3.011055}}
328         */
329}
